Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Yoke at the back, a seam under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim. Unlined.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a chest pocket in pile with an embroidered motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs and ribbing at the hems. Partly lined.
Striped tops in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with faceted plastic and glass beads. Length approx. 3.5 cm and approx. 14 cm.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Top in lightweight, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves, a zip down the front that continues along one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized padded gilet in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Contrasting colour lining and polyester filling.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Long-sleeved, checked shirt in lightweight cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip and detachable hood in a double layer of sturdy jersey. Collar with metal buttons, shoulder tabs with fake metal buttons and a yoke at the back. Zipped front pockets. Lined.
